Package com.billiards

Class Billiards

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • com.billiards.Billiards
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    public class Billiards
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    This class is the Backbone of the entire application. It is a hybrid GUI and manager class. It instantiates the necessary amount of all the other classes. It holds the loop that renders the game and updates the physics world. It opens a new screen when necessary and can play specific sounds. Serves as a bridge for all of the other classes. Extends the application adapter class for the library.
